#summary Redirecting inside one controller
#labels Phase-Design

= Sample Usage =

In your controller:

{{{
class MyController extends FaZend_Controller_Action {
    function indexAction() { 
        // ...
    }
    function doAction() { 
        // do something
        if ($doneSuccessfully)
            $this->_redirectFlash('successfully done');
    }
}
}}}

In your layout script:

{{{
<?=$this->flashMessage()?>
}}}

In your CSS you can define `p.flash` style.
